import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Inventario } from './inventario'; @Component({ selector: 'app-inventario', templateUrl: './inventario.component.html', styleUrls: ['./inventario.component.css'] }) export class InventarioComponent implements OnInit { inventario: Inventario = new Inventario() constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
